Ment2Link provides real time communication between mentors and mentees \n \n As there is a communication barrier between the mentors and the mentees, the mentors were not able to manage their schedules and the mentees were not able to access the mentors availability, profiles and make request for sessions \n \n The application allows the mentor(s) to organize their appointment, by setting their availability on the application and also allows the mentor(s) to manage their appointment effectively by accepting or rejecting the requests based on their availability. It allows the the mentor(s) to keep track of the mentees they will be seeing (keeping notes of the previous sessions if they already met). Mentee(s) can find the best mentor(s) available by viewing their profile and recommendations on the application."
